title: 독일산 도전과제 전시대 베이스
content:
[[module CSS]]
.achievement-de-marquee {width:100%;height: 120px;padding:0.5em 0;overflow:hidden;margin-bottom:10px;position:relative;}.achievement-de-marquee .medallion-window {min-width: 100%;width: {$denum}00px!important;margin:0;top: 15px;position: absolute;display:inline-block;white-space:nowrap;animation-name:marquee;animation-timing-function:linear;animation-duration: {$denum}s;animation-iteration-count:infinite;transform: translate(100%);}.achievement-de-marquee .medallion-window .medallion {width: {$denum}00px;max-width: {$denum}00px!important;display: flex;justify-content: space-between;}.achievement-de-marquee .medallion-window span {cursor: pointer!important;display: block; width: 100px; height: 100px;-webkit-tap-highlight-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);box-sizing: border-box;flex-grow: 1;transition: .25s;cursor: pointer;}.achievement-de-marquee .medallion-window span:hover {transform: scale(1.4);transition: .25s;}.afalse {display: none!important;}@keyframes marquee {0% {transform: translate(100%);}100% {transform: translate(-{$denum}00px);}}




[id*="achieve-hovertip"] {
    background: #fff;
    border: none!important;
    box-shadow: 1px 2px 5px #aaa;
    cursor: pointer!important;
    display: block!important;
    filter: none;
    font-size: 1.2em;
    opacity: 1;
    padding: 0.75em 1em 0.25em;
    transition: opacity 0.3s ease,filter 0.5s ease;
    visibility: visible;
}
[id*="achieve-hovertip"]:not([style]),
[id*="achieve-hovertip"][style*="none"] {
    filter: grayscale(1);
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden;
}

@media (max-width: 767px) {
[id*="achieve-hovertip"] {
    bottom: 0;
    left: unset!important;
    position: fixed!important;
    right: 0;
    top: unset!important;
    transition: opacity 0.3s ease,visibility 0.3s ease,filter 0.5s ease,transform 1.5s ease;
    transform:  translateX(0%);
}
[id*="achieve-hovertip"]:not([style]),
[id*="achieve-hovertip"][style*="none"] {
    transform: translateX(100%);
}
}
[[/module]]

[[iftags +구성요소]]
[[include info:start-standalone]]
도전과제 전시대 © [[user hal_aki]], [[user tsucchii0301]], [[user Sekai_s]], [[user 7happy7]]
[[include info:end]]
[[/iftags]]
